Crimes.Crime_Type: Human Rights Violations and Serious International Law Offenses
Legal_Provision_Involved: paragraph 97(1)(b) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Standard_of_Review: Reasonableness standard for decision; correctness for procedural fairness
Evidence_Requirement: Demonstrate inability or unwillingness to avail of state protection
Decision_Outcome: Claim rejected due to lack of credible evidence and adequate state protection in Albania
Institutional_Action: Refusal of refugee claim by the Board
Evidence_Type: Credible evidence on enforcement of laws against blood feuds
Individual_Status_or_Claim: Persons in need of protection under s. 97(1)(b)

Protection_Claim: Claimed need for protection due to blood feud
State_Protection_Assessment: Adequate state protection available in Albania
State_Protection_Adequacy: Found adequate by the Board and Court
Claimant_Status: Failed to qualify as persons in need of protection
Perpetrator_Entity: Alleged family or clan involved in blood feud
Victim_Basis: Fear of harm due to familial conflict

Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to Seek State Protection under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Violation_Type: Failure to demonstrate unavailability of state protection
Legal_Issue: Whether adequate state protection was unavailable in Albania
Application_Facts: Applicants claimed blood feuds but did not seek protection in Albania
Defendant_Behavior: Did not attempt to access Albanian state protection mechanisms
Grounds_for_Claim: Life risk due to blood feuds in Albania
Legal_Standard: Must show inability or unwillingness to access state protection due to risk
Assessment_Factor: Existence and enforcement of laws against blood feuds in Albania
Evidence_Used: Evidence of Albanian legal framework and enforcement practices
Application_Basis: Claim of risk from blood feuds without exhausting local remedies
Evidence_Assessed: Effectiveness of state response to blood feuds
Relief_Sought: Recognition as person in need of protection
Governing_Rule: Under s. 97(1)(b), must demonstrate lack of effective state protection
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Failed to rebut presumption of effective state protection
Harm_Assessment: Risk not proven to be beyond general population or due to state failure
Cause_Description: Entered Canada illegally and sought refugee status based on unverified blood feud claims without seeking protection in Albania
Evidence_Handling: Board assessed credibility and sufficiency of evidence

Evidence_Issues: Insufficient evidence to prove state protection inadequate
Residency_Compliance: Illegal entry and stay pending claim
Evidence_Assessment: State protection deemed adequate based on legal and enforcement evidence
Decision_Rationale: Applicants did not demonstrate inability to access state protection
Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of credible, specific evidence on personal risk and state failure
